resources.string: This phone and other devices (computers, mobile phones, etc.) are in same WiFi network and use other devices\' browsers to visit this phone \'s service address.

This phone establishes a WiFi hotspot. After other devices (computers, mobile phones, etc.) are connected to the portable hotspot of this phone, use other devices\' browsers to visit this phone \'s service address.
Service is currently running. If you exit the application we will stop it. Are sure you want to exit the application?
